title: Slime

params.defense: One-Time Basic (none if there is another Slime)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Move where you are on the Slime Player List.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever a non-Slime player adjacent to you on the Slime Player List dies, they will become a Slime instead.
- You can't move your spot two nights in a row.
- You cannot move your spot if you converted someone last night.
- You cannot move your spot the night after you are converted.
- All Slimes have access to a private Slime chat, and all Slimes will be able to see the Slime player list.
- Conversion Immunity.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have a majority of living players be a Slime.

desc:
Post 434
"Why can't we all be friends instead of killing each other ðŸ˜¦ "
